Title: Trump attends memecoin gala as protesters slam ‘crypto corruption’
Summary: US President Donald Trump hosted a dinner for hundreds of top investors in his crypto memecoin on Thursday . Sign-holding protesters outside and Democratic opponents decried the event as blatant “corruption” The unprecedented melding of US presidential power and cryptocurrencies is unprecedented .

Title: 2027: I have no presidential ambition, says Yahaya Bello
Summary: Yahaya Bello says he won't contest against President Bola Tinubu in 2027 because he has no presidential ambition . Bello expressed surprise and shock in a statement signed by Michael Ohiare, his Media Director, Bello .

Title: Cross River, Customs partner to revitalise CFTZ, Tinapa, others
Summary: Cross River State Government seeks collaboration with Nigeria Customs Service to revitalise Calabar Free Trade Zone (CFTZ), Tinapa Business Resort, and others . The government expressed confidence that the strengthened partnership would yield significant dividends .

Title: 531 corps members bag NNPC grants, starter packs
Summary: The Nigerian National Petroleum Company Limited, NNPC Ltd., has equipped 531 National Youth Service Corps (NYSC) members with business start .

Title: Police to begin disarmament in Cross Rivers communities over killings
Summary: Cross River State Police Command said it will soon move into Biakpan and Etono communities in Biase Local Government Area for a major disarmament operation . The operation follows months of renewed violence and refusal by local leaders to cooperate with peace .

Title: US firm to buy UK newspaper The Telegraph
Summary: US firm to buy UK newspaper The Telegraph . It comes after Labour government recently struck a trade agreement with the U.S. Labour government has struck a deal with the United States . The deal is the latest in a series of deals struck between the two countries .

Title: Rain disrupts outdoor activities at National Sports Festival
Summary: Rain disrupts outdoor activities at National Sports Festival . “If the games are indoor, there would be no problem. Again, the timing of the festival is also a thing of concern,” he said .

Title: Police threatens disarmament operation in Cross River’s warring communities
Summary: Police threatens disarmament operation in Cross River’s warring communities . The CP said both communities have given the state and local government a lot of trouble .

Title: Tinubu needs second term; Northerners have nothing against him  — Shagari
Summary: Some northern leaders want to unseat President Bola Tinubu in 2027 . Former Minister of Water Resources, Muktar Shagari, has said that the people of the northern region do not have anything against him .

Title: NSF Gateway Games: Bayelsa maintains lead with 30 gold medals
Summary: Bayelsa garnered 30 gold, 12 silver and 13 bronze medals five days into the festival to maintain a comfortable lead with 30 gold medals .

Title: PICTORIAL: Nigeria, Germany strengthen economic ties
Summary: Yusuf Tuggar met with his German counterpart, Johann Wadephul, in Berlin on Thursday, in a bid to deepen economic and energy ties between Nigeria and Germany . Nigeria is Germany’s second-largest trading partner in sub-Saharan Africa . The German foreign ministry has identified energy cooperation as a key area for bilateral economic

Title: Traditional rulers, Christian, Islamic clerics unite for Southern Kaduna peace
Summary: Traditional rulers across Southern Kaduna have thrown their weight behind a unity initiative . The initiative was convened by the Southern Kaduna Christian Leaders Association in collaboration with prominent Islamic clerics . The meeting, which took place on Thursday in Kafanchan, brought together monarchs from across ethnic and religious divides in what stakeholders have described as a historic

Title: NEMA unveils 2025 flood preparedness campaign in Bauchi
Summary: The National Emergency Management Agency has launched the 2025 National Preparedness and Response Campaign to mitigate the impact of flooding on communities in Bauchi State . The campaign by NEMA was a strategic plan for preparedness and response to flooding in Nigeria in response to an early information warning by the Nigerian Meteorological Agency .

Title: Soldiers kill 16 terrorists in Borno – Army
Summary: Troops of Operation Hadin Kai on Friday neutralised 16 ISWAP/Boko Haram terrorists in the Damboa local government area of Borno state . Nigerian Army said the combined firepower from both ground and air forces overwhelmed the insurgents after about two hours of intense engagement, forcing them to retreat in disarray .

Title: PICTORIAL: Davido, Cubana Chiefpriest visit Akpabio in Abuja
Summary: Nigerian Afrobeats superstar David Adeleke, also known as Davido on Thursday paid a courtesy visit to Senate President Godswill Akpabio in Abuja . He was joined by nightlife businessman and celebrity barman Pascal Okechukwu . The visit was shared on Instagram by Cubana Chiefpriest through a video
